Introduction¶

Two classes represents this version of SSA package - internal (MSSA) and external (SSA). Internal class has more detailed functions, which represents the mathematical steps of algorithm. External one consists of MSSA part and plot part for plotting graphs with plotly design.

Package is designed for analysis of multivariate time series, but works also for 1-dimensional series.

Two ways of forecasting represented in this package require quick description, which provided here:

Rows and columns of the trajectory matrix in MSSA have different structure. Therefore, there exist two kinds of MSSA forecasting: row forecasting and column forecasting, depending on which space is used (row or column space respectively). Usually, column forecasting is called MSSA-L and Row one - MSSA-K. For 1-d series MSSA-L forecast coincides with basic (one-dimensional) SSA forecasting algorithm.

For more details: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singular_spectrum_analysis and N.Golyandina’s papers.
